DOC.brief_summary: Grape seed proanthocyanidins report possess hypotriglyceridemic effect acute chronic consumption rodent . In study , aim investigate effect acute consumption proanthocyanidins breakfast meal human . Moreover , mechanism implicate reduction plasma triglyceride level grape seed proanthocyanidins human elucidate well activity vascular function .
DOC.brief_title: Ability Grape Seed Proanthocyanidins Reduce Postprandial Triglycerides Humans
DOC.detailed_description: The intervention consist administration 2 capsule contain grape seed proanthocyanidins extract 2 empty capsule ( placebo ) breakfast , consist 100g white bread , 75g salami , 50g fatty cheese , 125g yogurt ( 10 % fat ) , 25ml olive oil water ad libitum . The nutritional composition meal follow : 1.200 Kcal energy content , 15 % energy protein , 22 % carbohydrates 63 % fat ( 35 % saturated fat ) , 120mg cholesterol . Blood sample take point 0.5,1,2,3 6 hour breakfast . Moreover , urine sample collect time 0 6 hour .
DOC.criteria: Adults age 20 40 Signing inform consent Body mass index ( BMI ) low 18.5 great 27 Kg/m2 Smokers Regular medication Consumption medication last week Following weightloss diet Vegetarians Abnormal glucose level Diabetes Cardiovascular disease Gastrointestinal disease Anemia Nuts allergy
